sn28.4:1.3: “vippasannani kho te, avuso sariputta, indriyani; parisuddho mukhavanno pariyodato.
sn28.4:2.1: “Idhaham, avuso, sukhassa ca pahana dukkhassa ca pahana pubbeva somanassadomanassanam atthangama adukkhamasukham upekkhasatiparisuddhim catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharami.
sn28.4:2.2: Tassa mayham, avuso, na evam hoti:
sn28.4:2.3: ‘aham catuttham jhanam samapajjami’ti va ‘aham catuttham jhanam samapanno’ti va ‘aham catuttha jhana vutthito’ti va”ti.
sn28.4:2.4: Tatha hi panayasmato sariputtassa digharattam ahankaramamankaramananusaya susamuhata.
sn28.4:2.5: Tasma ayasmato sariputtassa na evam hoti:
sn28.4:2.6: “‘aham catuttham jhanam samapajjami’ti va ‘aham catuttham jhanam samapanno’ti va ‘aham catuttha jhana vutthito’ti va”ti.
